players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I am the detective, and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. We should all vote for him to win this!"
Diana: "Everyone, I stand by my claim as the detective. Charlie is the mafioso—vote for him to protect the town!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
